name: Ascent (Azureflames901)
description:
Warning: Make sure the resolution is 1920 X 1080

You are a goat! Help the goat reach the top of the mountain by navigating through this platforming experience. Kick objects with the 'K' button to push rocks to reach new heights and solve puzzles.

Credits:

Art Assets found on Google Images and edited in Photoshop

Goat Sprite: https://summersblossom.deviantart.com/art/Goat-Sprite-172460024

Rock & Big Rock Sprite: https://www.designtube.org/cont/rocks-under-the-sea-cartoon-image

Rock Wall Sprite: http://www.snakehillgames.com/spritelamp/

Rock Background Sprite: https://www.pinterest.co.uk/pin/653514595899385074/

WallJump Rock Sprite: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19361733/java-texture-png-modificaiton?lq=1

Checkpoint Sprite: https://www.shareicon.net/camping-flag-nature-checkpoint-109786

Enemy Goat Sprite: https://www.spriters-resource.com/download/16151/
